text: Aur jab hum logon ko iss amar kay baad kay inn per koi museebat parr chuki ho kissi nemat ka maza chakha detay hain to woh foran hi humari aayaton kay baray mein caalen chalney lagtay hain aap keh dijiye kay Allah chaal chalney mein tum say ziyada tez hai bil yaqeen humaray farishtay tumhari sab chaalon ko likh rahey hain
